title: Phase 2c: Port leaf sub-types batch 2 to TypeScript (9 types)
body:
## Overview

Port 9 more leaf sub-types from PHP to TypeScript. Like batch 1, these types have no dependencies on other schema types or enums.

## Reference

- **PHP source**: `php/src/v1/Schema/` (see individual files below)
- **TS conventions**: `AGENTS-ts.md`
- **TS skill**: `.claude/skills/ts-schema-implementation/SKILL.md`
- **Existing TS examples**: `ts/src/schema/Brand.ts` and batch 1 types (from Phase 2b)

## Types to implement

All files go in `ts/src/schema/`. Tests go in `ts/test/schema/`. All use positional constructor (all have ≤5 optional properties).

### 1. `LocationFeatureSpecification.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/LocationFeatureSpecification.php`

Properties:
- `name: string` (required)
- `value: boolean | string` (required) — note the union type

schemaType: `'LocationFeatureSpecification'`

### 2. `AlignmentObject.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/AlignmentObject.php`

Properties:
- `alignmentType: string` (required)
- `targetName: string` (required)
- `educationalFramework: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `targetUrl: string | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'AlignmentObject'`

### 3. `SizeSpecification.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/SizeSpecification.php`

Properties:
- `name: string` (required)
- `sizeGroup: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `sizeSystem: string | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'SizeSpecification'`

### 4. `SpeakableSpecification.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/SpeakableSpecification.php`

Properties:
- `cssSelector: string | readonly string[] | null` (optional, default null)
- `xpath: string | readonly string[] | null` (optional, default null)

Note the array union type — the PHP version accepts `string|string[]|null` for both properties.

schemaType: `'SpeakableSpecification'`

### 5. `WebPageElement.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/WebPageElement.php`

Properties:
- `isAccessibleForFree: boolean` (required)
- `cssSelector: string` (required)

schemaType: `'WebPageElement'`

### 6. `BedDetails.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/BedDetails.php`

Properties:
- `numberOfBeds: number` (required)
- `typeOfBed: string | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'BedDetails'`

### 7. `DataCatalog.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/DataCatalog.php`

Properties:
- `name: string` (required)

schemaType: `'DataCatalog'`

### 8. `DataDownload.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/DataDownload.php`

Properties:
- `contentUrl: string` (required)
- `encodingFormat: string | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'DataDownload'`

### 9. `VirtualLocation.ts`

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/VirtualLocation.php`

Properties:
- `url: string` (required)
- `name: string | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'VirtualLocation'`

## Testing

Create one test file per type in `ts/test/schema/`. Use TDD: write failing tests first, then implement.

Each test file must cover:
1. **Minimal construction** — only required properties, verify `@context`, `@type`, required fields
2. **Null omission** — optional properties when null do NOT appear in JSON output
3. **Full construction** — all properties set, verify they all appear
4. **Special types** — test `boolean | string` union for LocationFeatureSpecification, test `string | string[]` union for SpeakableSpecification

## Barrel exports

Update `ts/src/index.ts` to export all 9 new types. Keep exports sorted alphabetically.

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] All 9 schema class files created in `ts/src/schema/`
- [ ] All types use positional constructor (all ≤5 optional)
- [ ] Property names match PHP exactly
- [ ] Union types handled correctly (LocationFeatureSpecification, SpeakableSpecification)
- [ ] Test file for each type in `ts/test/schema/`
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm run test`)
- [ ] Biome passes (`npx biome check`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] `index.ts` updated with all new exports
- [ ] No modifications to `JsonLdGenerator.ts` or `TypedSchema.ts`
- [ ] No `any` types used
